description.narrative: The objective of the development cooperation among the parties is to produce cutting-edge research and analysis on the crucial issues.

title.narrative: Evidence that policymakers and other stakeholders are utilizing Brookings’s work to inform their approaches

description.narrative:
Baseline ( 2017) Despite previous efforts, policy discussions on development and security remain fragmented and there is not systematic, high-level political call to support the world’s poorest countries.
Target (2019) Provide pragmatic recommendations on how efforts on SDG 16 (Peace and Justice, Strong Institutions), and SDG 1 (No Poverty) can be buttressed with increased coordination and new thinking.
